mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_role_group ( cid, crgid, cname, ouid, addtime, status ) VALUES (#{cid},#{crgId},#{cname},#{uid},#{addTime},#{status})
INSERT INTO tb_role_relation ( cid, crgid, rrid, rrtype, ouid, addtime, status ) VALUES (#{cid},#{crgid},#{rrid},#{rrtype},#{uid},#{time},#{status})
INSERT INTO tb_company_role ( cid, crid, pcrid, cname, ouid, addtime, status ) VALUES (#{cid},#{crid},#{pcrid},#{cname},#{uid},#{addtime},#{status})

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO tb_user_role (cid,crid,uid,addtime,updtime,status) VALUES (#{item.cid},#{item.crid},#{item.uid},#{item.addtime},#{item.updtime},#{item.status}) ON conflict (cid, crid, uid) DO UPDATE SET status = '1'

update.foreach: UPDATE tb_user_role SET updtime =#{item.updtime}, status =#{item.status} WHERE cid = #{item.cid} and crid = #{item.crid} and uid = #{item.uid}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM tb_role_group WHERE cid =#{cid} and status='1'
SELECT cid, crgid, cname FROM tb_role_group WHERE cid =#{cid} and status='1' order by cid LIMIT #{pagesize} OFFSET #{start}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tb_role_relation WHERE status='1' AND crgid = #{crgid} AND rrtype=#{rrtype}

SELECT re.cid, re.crgid, re.rrtype, re.rrid, CASE rrtype WHEN '4' THEN u.cname WHEN '2' THEN cr.cname ELSE re.rrid END as rrmc,u.summary,u.relphone FROM tb_role_relation re LEFT JOIN tb_user_list u ON u.uid = re.rrid LEFT JOIN tb_company_role cr ON cr.crid = re.rrid WHERE re.status='1' AND re.crgid = #{crgid} AND re.rrtype=#{rrtype}
ORDER BY rrtype,re.id LIMIT #{pagesize} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT crgid, ptype, pid, mid AS ID, status FROM tb_role_menu_auth WHERE status = '1' AND cid =#{cid} AND crgid = #{crgid} AND pid = #{pid} AND ptype =#{ptype} UNION SELECT crgid, ptype, pid, pageid AS ID, status FROM tb_role_menu_auth WHERE status = '1' AND cid =#{cid} AND crgid = #{crgid} AND pid = #{pid} AND ptype =#{ptype} UNION SELECT ca.crgid, ma.ptype, ma.pid, ca.controlid AS ID, ca.status FROM tb_role_control_auth ca LEFT JOIN tb_role_menu_auth ma ON ca.cid = ma.cid AND ca.crgid = ma.crgid AND ca.pageid = ma.pageid WHERE ca.status != '2' AND ma.cid =#{cid} AND ma.crgid = #{crgid} AND ma.pid = #{pid} AND ma.ptype =#{ptype}
SELECT crid, cname FROM tb_company_role WHERE cid =#{cid} AND cname =#{cname} AND status in ('1') AND crid !=#{crid}
SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM tb_company_role WHERE cid = #{cid} AND status IN ('1','2')
SELECT cid, crid, pcrid, cname, addtime, updtime, status FROM tb_company_role WHERE cid = #{ cid } AND status IN ( '1', '2' ) ORDER BY crid LIMIT #{pagesize} OFFSET #{start}

select.foreach: SELECT ul.uid, #{item.cdid} AS cdid,ul.authid,gr.rgnames,gr.crgids FROM tb_user_list ul LEFT JOIN ( SELECT #{item.uid} AS uid, COALESCE ( string_agg ( rg.cname, ',' ), '' ) AS rgnames,COALESCE ( string_agg ( rg.crgid, ',' ), '' ) AS crgids FROM tb_role_relation rr RIGHT JOIN tb_role_group rg ON rg.status = '1' AND rg.cid = #{cid} AND rr.status = '1' AND rg.crgid = rr.crgid AND rg.cid = rr.cid WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_user_role ur WHERE ur.status = '1' AND ur.uid = #{item.uid} AND ur.crid = rr.rrid AND rr.rrtype = '2' ) OR ( rr.rrid = #{item.uid} AND rr.rrtype = '4' ) OR ( rr.rrid = #{item.cdid} AND rr.rrtype = '1' ) ) gr ON gr.uid = ul.uid WHERE ul.uid = #{item.uid}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM tb_user_role WHERE status = '1' AND cid =#{cid} AND crid = #{crid}

SELECT ur.crid, ur.uid, ul.cname,ul.summary,ul.relphone FROM tb_user_role ur LEFT JOIN tb_user_list ul ON ur.uid = ul.uid WHERE ur.status = '1' AND cid =#{cid} AND crid = #{crid} ORDER BY ur.id LIMIT #{pagesize} OFFSET #{start}
